title: Most popular product brands on Facebook 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Facebook fans in millions in the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
There is a difference of 159.62 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform KFC.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Facebook fans in millions and KFC has the lowest Facebook fans in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Facebook fans in millions in the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 10 number of Platforms.
Platform Facebook has the highest Facebook fans in millions and KFC has the lowest Facebook fans in millions.
Platform Samsung has the second highest value for Facebook fans in millions.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 159.62.
Facebook fans in millions at Platform Facebook is 214.62 , second place is Samsung at 160.05, and thirdly is Coca-Cola at 107.11.
The Platform Facebook tends to be 2.23 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 962.41.
